div.p: This value set includes all possible UCUM codes used for Age - that it is, all units which have the same canonical unit as "a" (year)

The UCUM codes, UCUM table (regardless of format), and UCUM Specification are copyright © 1999-2009, Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Unified Codes for Units of Measures (UCUM) Organization. All rights reserved.

description.value: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). This value set includes all UCUM codes
